name: Mysterious Gamebert Boxes
description:
Mysterious Gamebert Boxes Description:

Gamebert was born in a castle of the game kingdom. He was chosen as a king of the game world with extraordinary power to support game developers, designers, producers, artists, musicians and more. The knowledge of building games and skills was founded in his genes. Now he is grown up and ready to spread all gaming wisdom to the world.

Enemies are everywhere trying to steal his knowledge to lead the gaming world. So they secretly started to plan to get him down and lose the power. One day, they sent him to the world of mysterious loot-boxes to distract him and take his knowledge. Gamebert mission started to find the mysterious box to save the kingdom.

How to Play:
  • Character Movement:  (LEFT)  A   (RIGHT)  D 
  • Jump: SPACE
Team:
  • Mutaz - Producer, Game Assets.
  • Reza  - Narrative, Intro Video, Sound/SFX.
  • Alin - Programming, Game/Level Design.
  • Nick- Art, Animation, Game/Level Design.
